Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 668 Unclean Habitations

668.01Responsibility of owners and occupants generally. 668.02Criteria for determining unclean and unsanitary conditions. 668.03Notice to abate nuisances or vacate premises. 668.04Hearings. 668.05Posting notices of vacation. 668.06Enforcement of vacation orders. 668.07Enforcement through court proceedings. 668.08Hotels, lodging houses, etc. 668.09Order to clean up premises. 668.10Annual inspections. 668.11Resolutions for abatement. 668.12Service of resolution. 668.13Orders for abatement from Manager. 668.14Periodic inspections.

CROSS REFERENCES

Nuisances - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3767

Proximity of animals to habitations - see GEN. OFF. 618.15

Disease - see GEN. OFF. 660.02

Filthy accumulations - see GEN. OFF. 660.04

Undesirable accumulations - see GEN. OFF. 660.17
